oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper for Jacob Vandagriff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge paper for Pvt. Jacob Vandergriff, Co. A, 6th Reg't of the Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA. He was discharged on 30 June 1865 at Nashville by reason of telegram from War Dept. Vandergriff mustered in at Chattanooga on August 20, 1864 at the age of 19. Born in Hamilton County, TN, his occupation was in farming. He mustered out in Nashville on June 30, 1865.
